params.name: num_channels
params.description: The number of input channels.

params.name: image_size
params.description: The size (resolution) of each image.

params.name: patch_size
params.description: The size (resolution) of each patch.

params.name: hidden_sizes
params.description: Dimensionality (hidden size) of the Transformer encoders at each stage.

params.name: neck_hidden_sizes
params.description: The number of channels for the feature maps of the backbone.

params.name: num_attention_heads
params.description: Number of attention heads for each attention layer in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: mlp_ratio
params.description: The ratio of the number of channels in the output of the MLP to the number of channels in the input.

params.name: expand_ratio
params.description: Expansion factor for the MobileNetv2 layers.

params.name: hidden_act
params.description: The non-linear activation function (function or string) in the Transformer encoder and convolution layers.

params.name: conv_kernel_size
params.description: The size of the convolutional kernel in the MobileViT layer.

params.name: output_stride
params.description: The ratio of the spatial resolution of the output to the resolution of the input image.

params.name: hidden_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout probability for all fully connected layers in the Transformer encoder.

params.name: attention_probs_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout ratio for the attention probabilities.

params.name: classifier_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout ratio for attached classifiers.

params.name: initializer_range
params.description: The standard deviation of the truncated_normal_initializer for initializing all weight matrices.

params.name: layer_norm_eps
params.description: The epsilon used by the layer normalization layers.

params.name: qkv_bias
params.description: Whether to add a bias to the queries, keys and values.

params.name: aspp_out_channels
params.description: Number of output channels used in the ASPP layer for semantic segmentation.

params.name: atrous_rates
params.description: Dilation (atrous) factors used in the ASPP layer for semantic segmentation.

params.name: aspp_dropout_prob
params.description: The dropout ratio for the ASPP layer for semantic segmentation.

params.name: semantic_loss_ignore_index
params.description: The index that is ignored by the loss function of the semantic segmentation model.
